metadata.description: Unified task management for manage-port project - AUDITED
metadata.auditNotes: Comprehensive codebase audit completed - task statuses updated to reflect actual implementation

tasks.title: Setup Project Repository and Initial Configuration
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with Next.js, shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, Convex, and Clerk.
tasks.notes: Project successfully initialized with all required dependencies

tasks.title: Implement Clerk Authentication Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Clerk authentication to secure the application and manage user sessions.
tasks.notes: Authentication flow implemented and working

tasks.title: Design and Implement Dashboard UI
tasks.description: Create a dashboard page with key metrics for property portfolio overview.
tasks.notes: Dashboard completed with responsive design

tasks.title: Define Convex Database Schema for Properties
tasks.description: Design and implement the database schema for property management.
tasks.notes: Schema supports all property fields including utility management

tasks.title: Implement Properties Page with CRUD Operations
tasks.description: Build a page to list, add, edit, and delete properties.
tasks.notes: Full CRUD operations with responsive design

tasks.title: Define Convex Database Schema for Utilities
tasks.description: Design and implement the database schema for utility management.
tasks.notes: Schema supports utility bills and tenant charges

tasks.title: Implement Utilities Page with Property Association
tasks.description: Build a page to manage utilities for each property.
tasks.notes: Property-based utility management implemented

tasks.title: Define Convex Database Schema for Leases
tasks.description: Design and implement the database schema for lease management.
tasks.notes: Lease schema with property relationships

tasks.title: Implement Lease Management Page
tasks.description: Build a page to manage leases for each property.
tasks.notes: Lease CRUD operations with unit assignment

tasks.title: Implement Property Details Page
tasks.description: Build a dedicated page to view detailed information for a single property.
tasks.notes: Comprehensive property view with linked data

tasks.title: Implement Data Validation and Error Handling
tasks.description: Add robust data validation and error handling throughout the application.
tasks.notes: Comprehensive validation with Zod schemas

tasks.title: Implement Security and Performance Best Practices
tasks.description: Apply security and performance best practices to the application.
tasks.notes: Security measures and performance optimizations in place

tasks.title: Document Future Enhancements for Properties and Utilities Pages
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive document outlining future enhancements.
tasks.notes: Documentation created in project repository

tasks.title: Fix Navigation and Dashboard Access
tasks.description: Improve navigation flow and ensure users can easily access the dashboard.
tasks.notes: Navigation improved with clear dashboard access

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Collapsible Sidebar
tasks.description: Create a responsive sidebar that collapses on mobile with hamburger menu.
tasks.notes: Responsive sidebar with mobile support

tasks.title: Implement Document Management System
tasks.description: Build complete document upload and management functionality.
tasks.notes: FULLY COMPLETE - drag-drop upload, categorization, search, bulk operations, preview, property linking all implemented

tasks.title: Standardize Form Design System
tasks.description: Create consistent form styling across all components using design system tokens.
tasks.notes: Need to audit all forms and create design tokens

tasks.title: Create Mobile-Responsive Table System
tasks.description: Implement responsive tables with card view for mobile devices.
tasks.notes: Critical for mobile user experience

tasks.title: Add Quick Actions Dashboard
tasks.description: Implement quick action cards on dashboard for common tasks.
tasks.notes: Depends on navigation improvements

tasks.title: Implement Real-time Notification System
tasks.description: Build notification system for lease expirations, overdue items, and important alerts.
tasks.notes: High value feature for user engagement

tasks.title: Enhanced Search and Filtering System
tasks.description: Implement advanced search with filters, tags, date ranges, and saved searches.
tasks.notes: Complex feature requiring search infrastructure

tasks.title: Create Property Creation Wizard
tasks.description: Replace single form with multi-step property creation wizard.
tasks.notes: Needs standardized form system first

tasks.title: Financial Analytics Enhancement
tasks.description: Add advanced financial analytics including ROI calculations and profit/loss tracking.
tasks.notes: High-value feature for property management

tasks.title: Update Database Schema for Enhanced Unit Management
tasks.description: Add new fields to support better unit management and utility splitting.
tasks.notes: Schema updated with unit management fields and migration completed

tasks.title: Create Enhanced Property Creation Flow
tasks.description: Build new property creation wizard with integrated unit setup.
tasks.notes: Property wizard with unit creation implemented

tasks.title: Build Utility Responsibility Setup Interface
tasks.description: Create UI for configuring utility splits with presets.
tasks.notes: Utility split interface with preset options completed

tasks.title: Enhance Utility Bill Entry with Auto-Charge Generation
tasks.description: Update bill entry to show splits and auto-generate charges.
tasks.notes: Auto-charge generation is IMPLEMENTED and working. Missing: split preview UI in bill form, vacant unit handling UI enhancements

tasks.title: Update Lease Creation for Unit Assignment
tasks.description: Require unit selection when creating leases for multi-unit properties.
tasks.notes: Essential for proper unit-lease relationships

tasks.title: Build Bulk Charge Management Interface
tasks.description: Create tools for bulk generating and managing tenant charges.
tasks.notes: Efficiency feature for property managers

tasks.title: Update Property Dashboard for Multi-Unit Display
tasks.description: Enhance property details page to show units and splits.
tasks.notes: Visual enhancements for multi-unit properties

tasks.title: Handle Single to Multi-Unit Conversion
tasks.description: Allow converting single-family to multi-unit properties.
tasks.notes: Advanced feature for property evolution

tasks.title: Create Utility Split Testing Suite
tasks.description: Comprehensive tests for new utility functionality.
tasks.notes: Essential for ensuring utility system reliability

tasks.title: Migration and Documentation for Utility System
tasks.description: Handle existing data migration and create user documentation.
tasks.notes: Documentation and migration support for users

summary.next_major_milestone: Complete lease-unit assignment validation and standardize form design system
summary.project_health: EXCELLENT - significantly more advanced than initially tracked
